TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeploymentType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定要对文件执行的部署类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of deployment to be performed on a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType AppGlobalResource = int32(7)

summary.span: 指定作为应用程序全局资源部署到 SharePoint 的文件部署。

span.span: Specifies deployment of the file as an Application Global Resource to SharePoint.

summary.span: AppGlobalResource 的默认路径为 {WebApplicationRoot}\App_GlobalResources。

span.span: The default path for AppGlobalResource is: {WebApplicationRoot}\App_GlobalResources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序全局资源引用的包清单 (manifest.xml)。Application Global Resources are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml). 它们将部署到 SharePoint Web 应用程序的 App_GlobalResources 文件夹。They are deployed to the 'App_GlobalResources' folder of the SharePoint Web application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType ApplicationResource = int32(6)

summary.span: 指定作为应用程序资源部署到 SharePoint 的文件部署。

span.span: Specifies deployment of the file as an Application Resource to SharePoint.

summary.span: 应用程序资源由包清单 (manifest.xml) 引用。

span.span: Application Resources are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

summary.span: ApplicationResource 的默认路径为 {WebApplicationRoot}\Resources。

span.span: The default path for ApplicationResource is: {WebApplicationRoot}\Resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType AppPackage = int32(11)

summary.span: 指定作为 SharePoint 的应用的一部分、但未打包到 wsp 的文件部署。

span.span: Specifies deployment of the file as part of an app for SharePoint, but not packaged into a wsp.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType ClassResource = int32(5)

summary.span: 指定作为类资源部署到 SharePoint 的文件部署。

span.span: Specifies deployment of the file as a Class Resource to SharePoint.

summary.span: 类资源由包清单 (manifest.xml) 引用。

span.span: Class Resources are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

summary.span: ClassResource 的默认路径为 {ClassResourcePath}。

span.span: The default path for ClassResource is {ClassResourcePath}.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType DwpFile = int32(10)

summary.span: 指定一个标记为“资源”的文件，该资源在包清单中作为 Dwp 文件被引用。

span.span: Specifies a file marked as Resource that is referenced in the package manifest as a Dwp file.

summary.span: Dwp 文件由包清单 (manifest.xml) 引用。

span.span: Dwp files are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

summary.span: DwpFile 的默认路径为 {WebApplicationRoot}\wpcatalog。

span.span: The default path for DwpFile is {WebApplicationRoot}\wpcatalog.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType ElementFile = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定部署到 SharePoint 的元素文件部署。

span.span: Specifies the deployment of element files to SharePoint.

summary.span: 元素文件由功能清单 (feature.xml) 引用。

span.span: Element files are referenced by the feature manifest (feature.xml).

summary.span: ElementFile 的默认路径为 {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features。

span.span: The default path for ElementFile is {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType ElementManifest = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定部署到 SharePoint 的元素清单部署。

span.span: Specifies the deployment of element manifests to SharePoint.

summary.span: 元素清单由功能清单 (feature.xml) 引用。

span.span: Element manifests are referenced by the feature manifest (feature.xml).

summary.span: ElementManifest 的默认路径为 {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features。

span.span: The default path for ElementManifest is {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType NoDeployment = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定不部署到 SharePoint 的文件。

span.span: Specifies files that are not deployed to SharePoint.

summary.span: NoDeployment 的默认路径为空字符串。

span.span: The default path for NoDeployment is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType PackageOnly = int32(8)

summary.span: 指定标记为“仅限包”的文件，该文件包含在 WSP 文件中，且无任何部署详细信息。

span.span: Specifies files marked as Package Only, which are included in the WSP file without any deployment details.

summary.span: PackageOnly 的默认路径为空字符串。

span.span: The default path for PackageOnly is an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType Resource = int32(9)

summary.span: 指定作为资源文件部署到 SharePoint 的文件部署。

span.span: Specifies deployment of the file as Resource file to SharePoint.

summary.span: Resource 的默认路径为 {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features。

span.span: The default path for Resource is {SharePointRoot}\Template\Features.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 资源文件引用的包清单 (manifest.xml)。Resource files are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType RootFile = int32(4)

summary.span: 指定部署到 SharePoint 的根文件部署。

span.span: Specifies the deployment of root files to SharePoint.

summary.span: 根文件由包清单 (manifest.xml) 引用。

span.span: Root files are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

summary.span: RootFile 的默认路径为 {SharePointRoot}。

span.span: The default path for RootFile is {SharePointRoot}.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.DeploymentType TemplateFile = int32(3)

summary.span: 指定部署到 SharePoint 的模板文件部署。

span.span: Specifies the deployment of template files to SharePoint.

summary.span: 模板文件由包清单 (manifest.xml) 引用。

span.span: Template files are referenced by the package manifest (manifest.xml).

summary.span: TemplateFile 的默认路径为 {SharePointRoot}\Template。

span.span: The default path for TemplateFile is {SharePointRoot}\Template.
